story_05_04000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Oh, wow! Check out that sky!
This place is great, Skyla!
story_05_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: I’m glad you like it, too!
story_05_04000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Did you and your Pokémon get a good enough
chance to rest?
story_05_04000/2401_1001_0400_10: Well then, why don’t we have a little bit of fun?
story_05_04000/2401_0401_0600_10: Oh, you know what I’m talking about.
story_05_04000/2401_1001_0900_10: I think we need a fun battle to pick our spirits up!
